text: Crella elegans is a species of marine demosponges in the family Crellidae found in the Adriatic. It is the type species of its genus. It is the host of the ectoparasitic copepod Cryptopontius capitalis. == References == == External links == * Crella (Crella) elegans at World Register of Marine Species (WoRMS) * Category:Poecilosclerida Category:Animals described in 1862
title: Crella elegans
